about_the_game:
The sequel to "UKNON Jones & Guynelk - Awesome!"
After Jones' friends are rescued, Jones discovers that his grandfather has mysteriously disappeared. He was looking for a mythical treasure called: "Crystal Cereal". Jones, Guynelk, Elsa and Princess Saphir decide to search for the crystal cereals to find Jones' grandfather.

Main Features :
-Cross this beautiful world with varied environments, with 4 playable characters.
-Use the power of time to change the environment by going to the past or future.
-Use your different items like a drone that stuns enemies and monitors the surroundings, or the X-bomb that can create explosions.
-Face increasingly difficult bosses and find their weak point.
-Participate in various mini-games or compete against your friends in split screen.
-Take photos of enemies or characters to get information about them in this game created by one person.

name: UKNON Jones & Guynelk 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: After Jones' friends are rescued, Jones discovers that his grandfather has mysteriously disappeared. He was looking for a mythical treasure called: "Crystal Cereal". Jones, Guynelk, Elsa and Princess Saphir decide to search for the crystal cereals to find Jones' grandfather.
supported_languages:
English, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
